title: Excellent service
text: We used this company 3 times while in Rome. From airport to Rome hotel. Hotel to Port. Port to Airport. The drivers were very punctual and friendly. The car was comfortable to ride in.Would highly recommend.

title: Lovely dinner
text: Enjoyed eating at this family run restaurant. Very friendly and food was delicious. My only complaint was being asked how we would like to tip. I find this embarrassing when tipping is optional in Rome.

title: Lovely lunch
text: Enjoyed our seaside lunch here. Food was lovely and the outlook beautiful. Authentic family owned business. Swordfish was delicious and fresh. Glad our driver Gabriel recommended.

title: Interesting
text: Had never heard of before and after having been to Pompeii was surprised to hear of it. A hidden piece of history!

title: Wonderful!
text: The whole day was a pleasure. Our driver Gabriel was very accomodating to our wishes. It was a comfortable journey and a memorable one. The suggestion to go to Akrotori was a great idea as we hadn't heard of it before. Followed by lunch at the beach was enjoyable. There was no rush to be anywhere which made the day memorable.

title: Amazing history
text: Enjoyed our visit here but unfortunately due to bad management we were stuck in a queue for 1.5 hours trying to get out! The supervisors were rude and obviously caught off guard by the amount of visitors due to it being free entry that day. This impacted on the rest of our time in Athens that day.

title: Very Accomodating
text: Thoroughly enjoyed our day with Nikola. He was a great driver and explained the history very well. Made sure we were happy with our itinerary. Made everything as easy as possible for us with entries into Acropolis etc. Very punctual and comfortable ride.
place: The Best of Athens Full Day Private tour

title: Terrific
text: Found it very interesting and amazing history. Certainly worth a visit. So many hidden treasures in Athens

title: Fabulous
text: Our tour through City Wonders was a great day! The guide was very informative and helpful all day. The bus driver did a great job too. Highly recommend!
place: Pompeii Ruins & Mt Vesuvius Volcano Day Trip from Rome

title: Wow
text: What a fascinating piece of history! Really enjoyed our tour guide that took us around and explained everything with such detail. Even the rain didn't spoil the experience
place: Discover the Ancient Ruins of Pompeii: Day Trip from Rome

title: Lovely spot and a very interesting tour
text: Had a great tour of the farm. Was very informative and also a lot of fun interaction with the guides. Lots to see and finished off with a short helicopter flight over Broome. Our bus driver Brenda who picked us up from the port was an excellent driver and also very informative about Broome. Went out of her way to treat us to a tour around the city center as well.

title: Great Park
text: Had a wonderful 2 night stay with our van on the weekend. Beautiful caravan park with great facilities. Park was fairly full but it was not a problem. Excellent position to the heart of Echuca that was only a short walk along the river. Will definitely return one day!

title: Lovely lunch
text: Met up with friends for lunch and had a table of 8 in our own little nook in the hotel. Lovely and private and roomy. All our meals were lovely. Took some time to be served however it was a busy day. Staff were lovely and friendly. Décor of the hotel was great and fit in with the Historical Port area. Everyone enjoyed their meals :)

title: Morning Tea
text: Such a delicious choice of pastries, buns etc. Very busy place proving how popular the bakery is. Lovely outdoor area overlooking the river which is perfect on a warm day. Staff were efficient and friendly.

title: Scrumptious dinner
text: beautiful hotel with an even better menu. Value for money. Staff very helpful and efficient. Went to no end of trouble to fit us in on a busy night.

title: Good food
text: Our lunch was good here. Have been a couple of times in the past 6 months. However found the lady there quite abrupt and the service a bit all over the place both times we were there.

title: Wonderful stay
text: We stayed in a deluxe room which was very nicely appointed. The bed was comfy as and the bathroom beautiful. the Foxtel didn't work unfortunately but we weren't there for the TV. The grounds were lovely to walk around and well maintained. The restaurant experience was really unique. We had the 8 course menu which was full of flavours and unusual combinations which worked well. Staff were very friendly and helpful. Also ate in the public bar which did not disappoint either. While a lot of people would consider the restaurant prices exorbitant we enjoyed the experience. Always nice to try something different.

title: Cape Leveque day trip
text: Did a day trip to Cape Leveque. Our driver Brett and his wife Christine were the perfect hosts. The sights were wonderful. Finished the day by flying back with King Leopold Aviation who showed us the magnificent Dampier Peninsula from the air. Wonderful day!

title: Beagle Bay
text: Loved the pearl alter. Beautiful to see! The community of Beagle Bay is a lovely place to visit and so neat.

title: Great lunch
text: Had lunch here while staying at Cable Beach. Staff were very friendly and the food was delicious. Great spot to view the beach!

title: Visually pleasing on the eye
text: What a beautiful part of Australia. One of the best beaches I have visited in the world. Clean, white sands and blue, blue water!

title: Handy store
text: great spot to shop when needing a top up of essentials. Lots of groceries to choose from and a lovely take-away section as well.
place: Cable Beach General Store and Cafe

title: Ideal location
text: Beautiful restaurant and bar. Location perfect for watching the sunset over Cable beach. Staff friendly and helpful. Food delicious. Choice of A la Carte or Bar snacks and pizza.

title: Bungle Bungle day trip
text: Cannot recommend highly enough. Our pilot Aran was the perfect host for the day. Very knowledgeable and informative throughout. Took care of my elderly mum even on the land content of our day. A wonderful Kimberley experience.

title: Dinner and drinks
text: Love this place. Visited again after our first time 3 years ago. Happy to see it has the same atmosphere and the brews just as good. Loving their cider too!

title: Great Place
text: Just spent 10 nights here and loved it. The room had fantastic beachfront views of Waikiki. It was a perfect size for 3 adults. The staff were very helpful and friendly. The location is great and close to all the beautiful shopping and restaurants on offer. The on site restaurant was lovely and casual with a friendly atmosphere and great entertainment each night. Being on the 10th (top) floor it was terrific to have our own express lift which was for use by floors 9 & 10. Made our journey to the room quick each time.It was clean and well maintained and the pool area beautiful. would stay again!

title: Great Place to Stay
text: Thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Tindarra. The Villa was beautiful, modern and spacious. We bought a package deal which was exceptional value. Even though it was a cool, wet weekend we were very comfortable indoors and the outdoor spa caves were very enjoyable and warm. Would not hesitate to visit again. All the main attractions were on a short drive away.
